paper_keywords: exceptional finite groups of Lie type
paper_abstract: We study some geometry of the exceptional group G(2)(q), q even, in terms of symplectic geometric configurations in the projective space PG(5,q). Using the spin representation of Sp(6)(q), we obtain an alternative description of the Split Cayley hexagon H(q) related to G(2)(q). We also give another geometric proof of the maximality of G(2)(q), q even, in PSp(6)(q).
paper_title: On the geometry of the exceptional group G(2)(q), q even
